.  It is said to be the largest olive producing area in the world, producing 10% of the worlds olives.

The village "Cazorla" is very worthy because you will find beautiful mountains, plenty of water, "guadalquivir" river, nice food, wooden bungalows, deer, eagles etc. In the surroundings you will find tiny villages and nice landscape with a wide variety of tourist activities.
